General.Name: Abits Group Inc.
General.Description: Abits Group Inc. operates in the bitcoin mining business in the United States. The company was formerly known as Moxian (BVI) Inc and changed its name to Abits Group Inc. in November 2023. Abits Group Inc. was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Causeway Bay, Hong Kong.
General.Address: Lee Garden One, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong
